DescriptionTemplates: A {Adjective} corridor stretches before you. {Detail}. Flickering lights cast erratic shadows along the walls.
This {Adjective} passage connects distant chambers. {Detail}. The air is thick with the smell of decay.
You enter a {Adjective} hallway. {Detail}. Your footsteps echo in the confined space.
Details: Rust flakes fall like snow from the ceiling
Condensation pools on the uneven floor
The walls are covered in oxidized stains
